body_html:
I also had this same issue, ...is not a supported wheel on this platform.. when trying to install with python 3.4.3 and pip 8.1

To fix issue:

  • used pyenv to pull down upgraded to python 3.5.1, switched it to be my global python
  • Created a virtual env via pyvenv (not virtualenv, but I think this is irrelevant)
  • Ran pip install --upgrade https://storage.googleapis.com/tensorflow/mac/tensorflow-0.7.1-cp35-none-any.whl

Worked!!!

body:
I also had this same issue, .**..is not a supported wheel on this platform.**.  when trying to install with python 3.4.3 and pip 8.1

To fix issue:
- used pyenv to pull down upgraded to python 3.5.1, switched it to be my global python
- Created a virtual env via pyvenv (not virtualenv, but I think this is irrelevant) 
- Ran  `pip install --upgrade https://storage.googleapis.com/tensorflow/mac/tensorflow-0.7.1-cp35-none-any.whl`

Worked!!!
